snippet: Amid more economic upheaval in Europe, investors have again turned to havens like Treasury bonds. But how long can the patterns repeat?
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column observes that, amid more economic upheaval in Europe, investors have again turned to havens like Treasury bonds; questions how long the pattern can continue; notes that analysts predict great market volatility will probably occur, with major declines in stocks and a further rally in bonds, unless pressing fiscal issues are resolved,
lead_paragraph: Amid more economic upheaval in Europe, investors have again turned to havens like Treasury bonds. But how long can the patterns repeat?

headline.print_headline: Flights To Safety Can’t Hide The Dangers
headline.seo: Investors’ Flights to Safety Can’t Hide the Danger
headline.main: Flights to Safety Can’t Hide the Dangers
